EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Hey}}, Take The VMTurbo Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Take The VMTurbo Challenge. Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Overprovisioning and firefighting are the struggles of Olde World IT.
Welcome to the New World.
We challenge your existing operations manager to a duel. Complete your activation of the VMTurbo Operations Manager trial <http://go.vmturbo.com/new-cloud-edition-license.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=trialnurture>, and watch as VMTurbo automatically drives your environment to its optimal state. No thresholds to set. No keeping guard. Just sitting back as your existing ops manager marvels at VMTurbo's ability to control the entire environment.
<"http://go.vmturbo.com/new-cloud-edition-license.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=trialnurture>
<http://youtu.be/yWyTXx4-yMI>
Don't have time for the VMTurbo Challenge? Contact us <mailto:<sales@vmturbo.com>> at your convenience to schedule a live demo; we are more than happy to help. With thanks from the New World, VMTurbo
Need help? Contact Sales at (877) 978 8818.
